directions: Combine wine, 1 1/2 cups water, sugar, and ginger in medium saucepan. Simmer over medium heat until reduced to 2 cups, about 16 minutes. Cool. Refrigerate until cold, about 1 hour. Remove and discard ginger.
Place fruit in large bowl. Add syrup; toss to coat. Cover; chill at least 2 hours and up to 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: 2 medium nectarines, halved, pitted, thinly sliced
2 medium peaches, peeled, halved, pitted, thinly sliced
title: Fresh Summer Fruit in Ginger-Wine Syrup
